typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	dataflow_CalDate as string (toString(minus(currentDate(),1),'dd-MM-YYYY'))
}
source(output(
		Name as string,
		Salary as integer,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['EmployeeData/** '],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> EmployeeDataSource
EmployeeDataSource aggregate(groupBy(Dept),
	Salary = sum(Salary)) ~> AggregateEmployeeData
AggregateEmployeeData sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['EmpAggregateData.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Empsink
